item.title: Anne Burrell’s Final Season of ‘Worst Cooks in America’ Premieres July 28 — Here’s How to Stream It Online
item.description: This marks the show’s 29th season on air and its 28th season with the late celebrity chef as mentor.

item.title: Food Network Star Anne Burrell’s Death Ruled a Suicide
item.description: The New York City Office of Chief Medical Examiner after an investigation concluded the TV chef died from “intoxication” due to multiple substances.
